entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 04:20 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ENE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
